review: Great Product! Just Contect to HDMI on TV, download the app onto your phone, laptop, or other devices, then Set Up or Pair, then start using. I Use it mainly with my cell phone which acts like a remote, for Netflix, Youtube, etc... I suggest you look for other compatible apps that will help you cast to the Chromecast because Chrome does not have an extension on most cell phones. So by using other extentions casting apps  (Vega, Web Video Caster,etc..) it opens up the posiblities of really allowing you to use whatever you are watching on your phone to the tv. This way you can really cast everything, every website, etc...
